diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@

+
+#include "tensorflow/core/platform/setround.h"
+
+#ifdef __STDC_IEC_559__
+#include <fenv.h> // fesetround, FE_*
+#endif
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+namespace port {
+
+ScopedSetRound::ScopedSetRound() {
+#ifdef __STDC_IEC_559__
+   std::fesetround(FE_TONEAREST);
+#endif
+}
+
+ScopedSetRound::~ScopedSetRound() {
+}
body: This is set while spawning a thread, so the flag is set at the thread level and will be automatically reset once the thread ends. @girving should confirm.
